summary: Tarun Chauhan, a rookie army officer undergoes ups and downs in his mission and learns the true meaning of 'war' to overcome his weaknesses.
cast: Ajay Devgn|Bobby Deol|Sanjay Dutt|Sunil Shetty|Tanishaa Mukerji|Nandana Sen|Sudesh Berry|Shahbaaz Khan|Vishal Thakkar|Kelly Dorji|Vivek Shauq|Sanjay Mishra|Shalu Sharma|Arun Behl|Subrat Dutta|Gargie|Anuj Gurwara|Imran Ahmed Khan|Alok Nath|Anjan Srivastav|Tiku Talsania|Mukesh Tiwari|Raj Zutshi
title: Tango Charlie
